Name: Download file
Description: Downloads a file from the internet to the local machine.
Author: ahmedig

Properties.Octopus.Action.Script.ScriptBody:
Write-Verbose "Downloading file $FileUrl, to the destination $FilePath" -Verbose
$client = new-object System.Net.WebClient
$client.DownloadFile($FileUrl, $FilePath)
Write-Verbose "File downloadded" -Verbose

Parameters.Name: FileUrl
Parameters.Label: File Url
Parameters.HelpText: Url of the file you want to download

Parameters.Name: FilePath
Parameters.Label: File Destination Path
Parameters.HelpText: Destination path of the file on disk
